alert.note: Alert for Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Simpson; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 9:12AM CST until January 25 at 10:15AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Simpson County in central Mississippi... Southwestern Smith County in central Mississippi... Eastern Lawrence County in south central Mississippi... Covington County in southeastern Mississippi... Jefferson Davis County in south central Mississippi... * Until 1015 AM CST. * At 912 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crystal Springs to near Rockport to near Jayess, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Robinwood around 915 AM CST. Silver Creek, Arm, Harrisville, and Union around 920 AM CST. New Hebron, Pinola, Shivers, Tilton, and Oak Vale around 925 AM CST. Braxton and Progress around 930 AM CST. Mendenhall, Prentiss, D`Lo, and Society Hill around 935 AM CST. Sanatorium, Clem, and Carson around 940 AM CST. Magee, Bassfield, Lone Star, and Martinville around 945 AM CST. Mount Olive and Melba around 950 AM CST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Covington; Jefferson Davis; Lawrence; Simpson; Smith
